item.title: Cyrptocurrency Prices and Google Trends Data
item.description: Introduction Blockchain technology and cryptocurrencies have come front and center as the marketâ€™s total market capitalization closes in on the $800 billion mark as writing this, growing over ~4300% since 2017 with much of the growth happening in recent months. With all the recent news on the subject, I thought it might be interesting to try to quantify the buzz against the cryptocurrency price data and how search interest may correlates with price swings.
